name: David Ramirez
text: It's so much easier to think of the 5 worst...    Ummm. 5 Best. Batman Begins, Superman 2, Avengers, Batman (the 1st Michael Keaton one), Iron Man (even though it's really a cg tech demo, the armor feels really fun, and RDJ is amusing).
